headline: Standing Alone, At Center of It All
abstract: Until late Thursday, Mr. Romney was the only Republican senator calling for witnesses in the impeachment trial. His G.O.P. colleagues are taking shots: One branded him “Jeff Flake on steroids.”
lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON — It’s been one of those spectacle weeks on Capitol Hill, the likes of which history might just stop to recognize, even if Trump-era Washington pauses for nothing.
keywords: Trump-Ukraine Whistle-blower Complaint and Impeachment Inquiry
